head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COVAN, MARY SARIN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COVAN, MARY SARIN

block.p: COVAN-Mary Sarin. May 30, 2000. Dear wife of the late Sidney Covan. Devoted sister of Dorie Sarin. Beloved mother of Dr. Frederick (Diane), loving grandmother of Alexander, Daniel, Zachary and Benjamin Covan, dearest friend of Jack Epstein. Well known owner of Sarin's Accessories on University Place. Services 10 AM, Friday, Gramercy Chapel, 152 2nd Ave.
